Text: Yeah its really annoying, you finish your download try to extrack and then it prompts you for a password fuck all those people.

It's really annoying to spend time downloading something only to find out you have to go to a "Website" to get a password. I don't trust these people and hope they are banned from the P2P!

Thanks for your efforts.

There are a few good password crackers for archives out there to get around stuff like that. Problem is most of the time the whole point is to get you to register on their site so the contents of the file are just something they found somewhere else and slapped a password on.
